# Robotics The science team has the ability to create several unique types of robots to suit the station's needs.
## Exosuit Forge
The metallic womb from which all robotic children rise, bit by bit. The [color=#a4885c]Exosuit Forge[/color] is where you'll be printing out most of the parts for your creations, such as: - Borg limbs - Mech parts and equipment - Proximity sensors
## Bots
[color=#a4885c]Bots[/color] are small, simple automata which can perform simple tasks, such as cleaning. They don't use power cells, but are quite fragile.
## Mechs
[color=#a4885c]Mechs[/color] are giant behemoths of metal designed to carry out a variety of functions respective to their model. They are piloted by players and requre power cells to function.
All mechs require assembly before usage; after slotting each part into the chassis, [color=#a4885c]Examine[/color] it to see how to proceed with construction.
## Equipment A mech is useless without any equipment. [color=#a4885c]Equipment[/color] are tools which can only be used by a mech.
- To install equipment, just click the mech with the equipment in hand. - To use equipment, perform the "Cycle Equipment" action until the tool you desire is equipped.
